```{r pet imaging}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
#| eval: !expr params$kuadrc_pet

cognitiveDecline <- TRUE

abeta_df <- BRIDGE21::get_database_values(
  centiloid_apet,
  img_scan_date_apet,
  data = data,
  event_name = redcap_event_name
)

abeta_df$img_scan_date_apet <- format(
  as.Date(abeta_df$img_scan_date_apet, tryFormats = c("%m/%d/%y", "%m/%d/%Y")),
  "%B %d, %Y"
)

petScanDescription <- BRIDGE21:::pet_amyloid_description(
  centiloid = abeta_df$centiloid_apet,
  cognitive_decline = cognitiveDecline,
  petScanDate = abeta_df$img_scan_date_apet
)

centiloid <- abeta_df$centiloid_apet[nrow(abeta_df)]

if (length(centiloid) >= 1) {
  ltex <- paste(
    #readLines("inst/qmd/sections/imaging/latex/pet.tex"),
    readLines("sections/imaging/latex/pet.tex"),
    collapse = "\n"
  )
  ltex <- glue::glue(
    ltex,
    petScanImage = "{sections/imaging/latex/images/pet_amyloid.jpeg}",
    centiloid = centiloid,
    amyloidHigh = ifelse(centiloid >= 19, "high", "not high"),
    petScanDescription = petScanDescription,
    .open = "{{",
    .close = "}}"
  )
  cat(paste0("", ltex, ""), sep = "\n")
}

BRIDGE21::format_quarto(type = "newpage")
```
